07/07/23 12:52

The brother of King Charles went for a ride around Windsor Castle this morning, stopping to say hello to the late Queen's former groom Terry Penury. Joined by a female groom, and casually dressed for the summer weather in an open collar shirt, Andrew rode through Windsor before jumping behind the wheel of a car.
